name: Catter
description:
Game on Epic MegaJam 2019

Swerve between asteroids and don't let the toast stick. Control the toast by moving your mouse.

Commeownder: This is it! The cats shall land onto the Earth! However, we've miscounted the suits, so you will have to do with a butter toast. You, as a cat, always land on your feet, and the toast always lands butter side down. Good luck!
